title: Bumbie the Dearest Deer
description: Bumbie, the dearest deer. Deep in the darkest forest he grew. Bumbie, the dearest deer. His mother the only friend he knew.
altHero: Bumbie, a baby deer, is propped up by his rabbit friend
alt1: Bumbie took a tumble and a butterfly lands on his tail
alt3: Bumbie prances around his mom in a meadow
